languages.text: Говорят, у пиратов тоже есть гордость. Ответом на угрозы становится запущенная торпеда и забористая брань по вокс-связи, от которой Мастер вокса уберегла ваши уши.

traits.locale_text: Говорят, у пиратов тоже есть гордость. Ответом на угрозы становится запущенная торпеда и забористая брань по вокс-связи, от которой Мастер Вокса уберегла ваши уши.

languages.text: Pirates are said to be proud people, in their own way. The response to your threats is a torpedo launch and some choice profanity over the vox-comm, from which the Vox Master decides to shield your ears.
languages.original_text: Говорят, у пиратов тоже есть гордость. Ответом на угрозы становится запущенная торпеда и забористая брань по вокс-связи, от которой Мастер вокса уберегла ваши уши.

traits.locale_text: Pirates are said to be proud people, in their own way. The response to your threats is a torpedo launch and some choice profanity on the vox comm, from which the Vox Master decides to spare your ears.

Pirates are said to be proud people, in their own way. The response to your threats is a torpedo launch and some choice profanity over the vox-comm, from which the Vox Master decides to shield your ears.

Pirates are said to be proud people, in their own way. The response to your threats is a torpedo launch and some choice profanity over the vox-comm, from which the Vox Master decides to shield your ears.

languages.text: 据说海盗都是高傲的人，以他们自己的方式保持着高傲。对于你的威胁，他们的反应是发射鱼雷，还在音阵频道说了很多极其难听的脏话。音阵大师决定屏蔽他们的信息。
languages.original_text: Pirates are said to be proud people, in their own way. The response to your threats is a torpedo launch and some choice profanity over the vox-comm, from which the Vox Master decides to shield your ears.

traits.locale_text: 据说海盗都是高傲的人，以他们自己的方式保持着高傲。对于你的威胁，他们的反应是发射鱼雷，还在音阵频道说了很多极其难听的脏话。音阵大师决定屏蔽他们的信息。

languages.text: Se dice que los piratas son gente orgullosa a su manera. Su respuesta a tus amenazas es un torpedo y una serie de insultos por voco que la maestra de vocos elige no transmitirte.
languages.original_text: Pirates are said to be proud people, in their own way. The response to your threats is a torpedo launch and some choice profanity over the vox-comm, from which the Vox Master decides to shield your ears.

traits.locale_text: Se dice que los piratas son gente orgullosa a su manera. Su respuesta a tus amenazas es un torpedo y una serie de insultos por voco que la maestra de vocos elige no transmitirte.

languages.text: 海賊には海賊なりの誇りがあると言われている。脅しに対しての反応は、魚雷の発射とヴォックス通信からの罵りの言葉。マスター・ヴォクスは耳を塞ぐことにした。
languages.original_text: Pirates are said to be proud people, in their own way. The response to your threats is a torpedo launch and some choice profanity over the vox-comm, from which the Vox Master decides to shield your ears.

traits.locale_text: 海賊には海賊なりの誇りがあると言われている。脅しに対しての反応は、魚雷の発射とヴォックス通信からの罵りの言葉。マスター・ヴォクスは耳を塞ぐことにした。

languages.text: Piraten sollen ja sehr stolze Leute sein, auf ihre Weise. Die Antwort auf deine Drohungen ist ein Torpedo gewürzt mit einigen netten Worten am Vox-System, vor denen die Voxmeisterin deine Ohren lieber schützt.
languages.original_text: Pirates are said to be proud people, in their own way. The response to your threats is a torpedo launch and some choice profanity over the vox-comm, from which the Vox Master decides to shield your ears.

traits.locale_text: Piraten sollen ja sehr stolze Leute sein, auf ihre Weise. Die Antwort auf deine Drohungen ist ein Torpedo gewürzt mit einigen netten Worten am Vox-System, vor denen die Voxmeisterin deine Ohren lieber schützt.

languages.text: On dit que les pirates sont des gens fiers, à leur manière. Leur réponse à vos menaces consiste en un tir de torpille et des insultes bien léchées à travers le vox, que le maître du vox décide de vous épargner.
languages.original_text: Pirates are said to be proud people, in their own way. The response to your threats is a torpedo launch and some choice profanity over the vox-comm, from which the Vox Master decides to shield your ears.

traits.locale_text: On dit que les pirates sont des gens fiers, à leur manière. Leur réponse à vos menaces consiste en un tir de torpille et des insultes bien léchées à travers le vox, que le maître du vox décide de vous épargner.

languages.text: Korsanların kendilerince gururlu insanlar olduğu söylenir. Tehditlerine yanıt olarak torpido fırlatıyor ve voks üzerinden seçmece küfürler yağdırıyorlar. Voks Üstadı, kulaklarını bu küfürlerden korumaya karar veriyor.
languages.original_text: Pirates are said to be proud people, in their own way. The response to your threats is a torpedo launch and some choice profanity over the vox-comm, from which the Vox Master decides to shield your ears.
